comments: Robinson (MIA) establishes himself in a screening position in Temple's (CHI) path and makes marginal contact as they disengage.
Adebayo (MIA) hands off the ball and establishes himself in a screening position in White's (CHI) path and absorbs the contact.
Temple (CHI) closes out on Robinson (MIA) and marginal body contact occurs after the release of his  jump shot attempt.
Ariza (MIA) makes contact with the ball and dislodges it from Valentine (CHI) before incidental contact occurs.
Butler (MIA) and Vucevic (CHI) engage and disengage with one another off ball.
Valentine (CHI) briefly places his hand against Robinson's (MIA) waist during the screen and Robinson is able to move through the marginal contact.
Valentine (CHI) makes contact with Robinson's (MIA) arm and contact affects his shot near the rim.
Ariza (MIA) briefly grasps Markkanen's (CHI) jersey during the screen and disengages.
Markkanen (CHI) establishes himself in a screening position in Butler's (MIA) path when incidental lower body contact occurs.
Adebayo (MIA) legally contests the jump shot attempt by White (CHI), who extends his leg to attempt to create contact.
White (CHI) makes marginal contact to Nunn's (MIA) body off ball and disengages.
Valentine (CHI) places a resting hand to Butler's (MIA) backside as he deflects the inbound pass.
Young (CHI) makes marginal contact to Butler's (MIA) body prior to the release of his pass attempt.
Vucevic (CHI) splits his feet before the start of his dribble.
Young (CHI) makes contact to Adebayo's (MIA) arm during his pass attempt, but an 8-second violation occurs prior to the whistle for a foul.
Miami does not advance the ball from the backcourt into the frontcourt within 8 seconds.
Adebayo (MIA) moves alongside of White (CHI) during his drive and marginal contact occurs during his shot attempt at the basket.
Markkanen (CHI) moves laterally into Nunn's (MIA) path during his drive and the contact affects his SQBR.
White (MIA) lowers his head and marginal contact occurs with Iguodala (MIA) in transition.
Iguodala (MIA) legally contest Temple's (CHI) jump shot attempt.
Markkanen (CHI) commits a take foul on Adebayo (MIA).
